item.description:
The topic of this event is why it's important to fall in love with your marketing if you want to have any hope of it working for you. We'll explore little-known secrets behind why some marketing works and some doesn't - even if you are doing everything right.

The Marketing Cafe™ is the online radio show that features simple, yet highly effective ideas for solopreneurs and small business owners like you who want to make a good living while making a difference in the world.

Get Show Access Info here: http://wp.me/P29Qf9-rl

Date: Thursday, Sept. 13, 2012

Time: 12 noon Eastern Time
(48 hour replay available if your schedule doesn't cooperate).

The featured guest speaker is Kelle Sparta, thought alchemist and shaman. Kelle works with people to help them create lives and businesses they can fall in love with. Kelle is the person you go to when you are ready to make a change - even if you don't know what that change will look like.

Your host is marketing results coach Mark Reinert, founder of Authentic Business Growth, LLC and the creator of the Business Growth Dojo™ the definitive business incubator for independent professionals and owners of small service-based businesses.

Get Show Access Info here: http://wp.me/P29Qf9-rl

During this program you will learn:

  • The little-known reason that your marketing might not work even if you do everything right.
  • What it means to fall in love with your marketing, and why it's so important. (You'll be surprised at how this is much more practical than it sounds.)
  • The biggest mistake that most first-time entrepreneurs make mentally when starting up.
  • The importance of being in alignment with your work.
  • The crucial role of assumptions in your business success.

Get Show Access Info here: http://wp.me/P29Qf9-rl
item.name: Fall In Love With Your Marketing!
